ActSpecific Claims Tribunal Act
PrecisAppointment of the HONOURABLE HARRY A. SLADE, a Judge of the Supreme Court of British Columbia, as full-time Chairperson of the Specific Claims Tribunal for a term of five years, effective December 11, 2010.
